item.description: About me I am currently a full stack developer at Nanome inc, working remotely from Paris, from low-level optimizations, improving software architecture, rendering quality and performance, to adding/improving high-level features and UI. I also implement python plugins for the Nanome platform, like OpenMM docking plugin. Before that, I was a post-doctoral fellow at LBT (Laboratoire de Biochimie Theorique) in Paris, in Marc Baaden’s team working on UnityMol, a molecular viewer built in Unity game engine.
